title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 §§ 146-3.9 - Split shift
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 §§ 146-3.9 - Split shift

State Regulations
A
split shift
is a schedule of daily
hours in which the working hours required or permitted are not consecutive. Interruption of working hours for a meal period of one hour or less does not
constitute a split shift. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12
§§
146-3.9

Amended

New

York State Register December 28, 2016/Volume XXXVIII, Issue 52, eff. 12/31/2016

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
